jump_scares.spoiler: Large rat suddenly appears next to Blake
Rat suddenly drops onto the floor
Rat triggers a trip wire, causing a loud, sudden explosion next to Blake and Schofield
Loud sound when plane crashes into the barn as Blake and Schofield run away
A loud gunshot rings out as Schofield thinks about jumping
A loud gunshot suddenly hits near Schofield as he rounds a corner approaching the shooter
A loud gunshot goes off as Schofield peaks his head out
Schofield and the shooter suddenly fire at each other at close range as soon as the shooter becomes visible as Schofield opens the door
A gunshot goes off as Schofield suddenly finds himself under fire again from a new shooter
An artillery shell strikes right next to Schofield as he walks down the trench
